posts.post_content:
Do [Mishra's Groundbreaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mishra's Groundbreaker) so that it becomes a creature. Then do [Fate Transfer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fate Transfer).
  
   
I like it. It's like a mini [Helix Pinnicle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helix Pinnicle). However, chump blockers (with flying) are annoying with this card.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: [Æther Snap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Æther Snap) sounds like a good combo, until you read its fine print. It says "remove all counters from all permanents and remove all tokens from the game." So it would remove the legendary creature token (it states "bring token into play" on the Dark Depths card). Unless this somehow plays on a stack where the token comes into play after the Aether Snap. A ruling by the magic officials would be good on that point. If this works I give it a five, otherwise I give it a three since you would have to get a perfect combo of a few cards or protect the land for a while before bringing it into play.
posts.html:

If this works I give it a five, otherwise I give it a three since you would have to get a perfect combo of a few cards or protect the land for a while before bringing it into play.
